GetTablesData.qstring:
SELECT col.TABLE_NAME,
      col.COLUMN_NAME,
      col.DATA_TYPE,
      col.IS_NULLABLE,
      REPLACE(REPLACE(col.COLUMN_DEFAULT, '(', ''), ')', '') AS COLUMN_DEFAULT,
      CASE tc.CONSTRAINT_TYPE WHEN 'PRIMARY KEY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsPK,
      CASE tc.CONSTRAINT_TYPE WHEN 'FOREIGN KEY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsFK,
      COLUMNPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID(col.TABLE_NAME), col.COLUMN_NAME, 'IsIdentity') as IsID,
      OBJECT_NAME(fki.object_id) AS REF_TABLE,
      fki.name AS REF_COLUMN
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS col
      LEFT JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE ccu
        ON col.TABLE_NAME = ccu.TABLE_NAME
        AND col.COLUMN_NAME = ccu.COLUMN_NAME
      LEFT JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS tc
        ON tc.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ccu.CONSTRAINT_NAME
      LEFT JOIN (
        select * 
        from sys.foreign_key_columns fkc
        join sys.all_columns ac
          on ac.object_id = fkc.referenced_object_id
          and ac.column_id = fkc.referenced_column_id
      ) fki
      ON OBJECT_NAME(fki.constraint_object_id) = ccu.CONSTRAINT_NAME
    WHERE ? LIKE '%'''+col.TABLE_NAME+'''%'

GetContactsFromTableAndID.qstring:
declare @sql varchar(max) = '
        select s.SupervisorEmail
        from '+?+' e
          join SupervisorInfo s
            on s.PlantID=e.'+?+'
            and (s.DepartmentID=e.'+?+' or s.DepartmentID is null)
            and (s.ZoneID=e.'+?+' or s.ZoneID is null)
        where '+?+'='+cast(? as varchar(max))

      EXEC(@sql)

GetViewData.qstring:
SELECT TABLE_NAME
      FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEW_TABLE_USAGE
      WHERE VIEW_NAME = ?

Plants.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT PlantID, Plant FROM vPlantLayout

Departments.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT DepartmentID, Department FROM vPlantLayout WHERE PlantID=?

Zones.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ZoneID, Zone FROM vPlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=?

WorkCells.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT WorkCellID, WorkCell FROM vPlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=? AND ZoneID=?

Machines.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MachineID, Machine FROM vPlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=? AND ZoneID=?

Subsystems.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT PartID, Part FROM vPlantLayout WHERE PlantID=? AND DepartmentID=? AND ZoneID=? AND MachineID=?

Auditors.qstring:
SELECT au.ID, au.AuditorName
      FROM Auditor au
      JOIN Auditor_Types at
      ON at.AuditorID=au.ID
      WHERE at.AuditorType=?

Supervisors.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, SupervisorName FROM Supervisor

AccidentTypes.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, AccidentType FROM AccidentTypes

InjuryTypes.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, InjuryType FROM InjuryTypes

BodyParts.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ID, BodyPart FROM BodyParts

CurrentTools.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MoldIDs.MoldNo, MoldIDs.MoldID FROM vJobProd JOIN MoldIDs ON MoldIDs.MoldNo=vJobProd.MoldNo WHERE MachID=?

Tools.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MoldNo, MoldID FROM MoldIDs

RootCauses.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT RCID, RootCause FROM vRootCause

SecondaryCauses.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SRCID, SecondaryRootCause FROM vRootCause WHERE RCID=?

MicroCauses.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MRCID, MicroRootCause FROM vRootCause WHERE RCID=? AND SRCID=?

Actions.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ActionID, Action FROM vRootCause WHERE RCID=? AND SRCID=?

EWORootCauses.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT RCID, RootCause FROM vEWO_RootCause

EWOSecondaryCauses.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT SRCID, SecondaryRootCause FROM vEWO_RootCause WHERE RCID=?

EWOActions.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ActionID, Action FROM vEWO_RootCause WHERE RCID=? AND SRCID=?

CloseIssue.qstring: INSERT INTO ClosedIssues (FormName, FormNum, SubCategory, ActionTaken) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

OpenIssue.qstring: DELETE FROM ClosedIssues WHERE FormName=? AND FormNum=? AND SubCategory=?

UATypes.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT UATID, UAType FROM vUATypes

UAMicroTypes.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT UAMTID, UAMicroType FROM vUATypes WHERE UATID=?

SupervisorEmailsByLocation.qstring: SELECT ID, SupervisorEmail FROM vSupervisor WHERE PlantID=? AND (DepartmentID=? OR DepartmentID IS NULL) AND (ZoneID=? OR ZoneID IS NULL)

AuditLines.qstring: SELECT Category, SubCategory, Details FROM vAuditLines WHERE FormName=? ORDER BY Line

AllMachines.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MachineID, Plant + ' - ' + Department + ' - ' + Zone + ' - ' + Machine FROM vPlantLayout

AllZones.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT ZoneID, Plant + ' - ' + Department + ' - ' + Zone FROM vPlantLayout

AllDepartments.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT DepartmentID, Plant + ' - ' + Department FROM vPlantLayout

AllToolsText.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT MoldID, MoldID FROM MoldIDs

GetToolDesc.qstring: SELECT TOP 1 0, MoldDesc FROM MoldIDs WHERE MoldID=?

OpenDashboardLayout.qstring: SELECT LayoutJSON FROM ReportingLayouts WHERE ID=?

UpdateDashboardLayout.qstring: UPDATE ReportingLayouts SET LayoutJSON=? WHERE ID=?

WCCPerAuditor.qstring: SELECT AuditorName, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM vWCC GROUP BY AuditorName

EHSPerAuditor.qstring: SELECT AuditorName, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM vEHS GROUP BY AuditorName

WCCPerWorkCell.qstring: SELECT Department + ' - ' + WorkCell AS WorkCell, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM vWCC GROUP BY Department + ' - ' + WorkCell

EHSPerWorkCell.qstring: SELECT Department + ' - ' + WorkCell AS WorkCell, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM vEHS GROUP BY Department + ' - ' + WorkCell

WCCPerZone.qstring: SELECT Department + ' - ' + Zone AS DeptZone, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM vWCC GROUP BY Department + ' - ' + Zone

EHSPerZone.qstring: SELECT Department + ' - ' + Zone AS DeptZone, COUNT(*) AS Audits FROM vEHS GROUP BY Department + ' - ' + Zone

AgingReport.qstring: SELECT Name + ' #' + CAST(ID  AS varchar(max)) + ' Line:' + CAST(LineNum AS varchar(max)) AS Issue, DaysOpen FROM vOpenIssues WHERE DaysOpen>0 ORDER By DaysOpen

SeverityReport.qstring: SELECT Severity, COUNT(*) AS [Open] FROM vOpenIssues GROUP BY Severity

IssuesBySeverity.qstring: SELECT Name + ' #' + CAST(ID  AS varchar(max)) + ' Line:' + CAST(LineNum AS varchar(max)) AS Issue, Severity FROM vOpenIssues ORDER BY Severity

ZonesNotEHSd.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone AS Zone FROM vPlantLayout WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone FROM vEHS WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone IS NOT NULL)

ZonesNotWCCd.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone AS Zone FROM vPlantLayout WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone FROM vWCC WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + Zone IS NOT NULL)

WorkCellsNotEHSd.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell AS WorkCell FROM vPlantLayout WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell FROM vEHS WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell IS NOT NULL)

WorkCellsNotWCCd.qstring: SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell AS WorkCell FROM vPlantLayout WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell FROM vWCC WHERE Plant + ' ' + Department + ' ' + WorkCell IS NOT NULL)

AuditorsWithoutWCCs.qstring:
SELECT DISTINCT AuditorName, AuditorType
      FROM Auditor au
      JOIN Auditor_Types at
      ON at.AuditorID=au.ID
      WHERE AuditorName NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT AuditorName FROM vWCC WHERE AuditorName IS NOT NULL)
        AND AuditorType='WCC'

AuditorsWithoutEHSs.qstring:
SELECT DISTINCT AuditorName, AuditorType
      FROM Auditor au
      JOIN Auditor_Types at
      ON at.AuditorID=au.ID
      WHERE AuditorName NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT AuditorName FROM vEHS WHERE AuditorName IS NOT NULL)
        AND AuditorType='EHS'

NumberOfIssuesByLine.qstring:
SELECT al.SubCategory AS [Line Item],
      COUNT(*) AS Total
      FROM vOpenIssues i
      JOIN vAuditLines al
      ON al.FormName=i.Name
      AND al.Line=i.LineNum
      GROUP BY al.SubCategory

5TAuditScores.qstring: SELECT ID, AuditDate, Plant, Department, Zone, Machine, [Total Score], [Total Possible] FROM vFiveT WHERE YEAR(AuditDate)=?

LPAAuditsByAuditorThisWeek.qstring:
SELECT au.AuditorName, COUNT(*) AS Audits
    FROM LPA l
	    JOIN Auditor au
		    ON au.ID = l.AuditorID
    WHERE DATEPART(wk, l.AuditDate)=DATEPART(wk, GETDATE())
    GROUP BY au.AuditorName
